def calculate_total_light_hours(a: int, b: int) -> int:
    sums = a
    while a > b:
        div = a // b
        sums += div
        k = a % b
        a = div + k
    return sums

def calculate_total_light_hours(a: int, b: int) -> int:
    sums = a
    while a < b:
        div = a // b
        sums += div
        k = a % b
        a = div + k
    return sums

def calculate_total_light_hours(a: int, b: int) -> int:
    sums = a
